essential.description: Indicates if the request fails to be loaded the service should be crash or not. Note: if the agent is not configured to crash, it will not crash regardless of this setting

id.description: Unique identifier of the statement in the agent

persistent.description: Indicates if the request should be stored persistently

essential.description: Indicates if the request fails to be loaded the service should be crash or not. Note: if the agent is not configured to crash, it will not crash regardless of this setting

persistent.description: Indicates if the request should be stored persistently

agentID.description: Provide the id of the agent where the response was generated

headline.description: Provide the content title of the response

producerID.description: Provide the id of the request that provide a response

producerName.description: Provide the name of the request that provide a response

topics.description: Topics of the response. Used as URI

essential.description: Indicates if the request fails to be loaded the service should be crash or not. Note: if the agent is not configured to crash, it will not crash regardless of this setting

persistent.description: Indicates if the request should be stored persistently

resources.description: The resource involved or result of the request. In most of the cases, the map has only one result. In some cases the map is empty, usually in case of an unsuccessfully request

responses.description: The verbose result of all process generated by a request. In most of the cases the vector has only one result

essential.description: Indicates if the request fails to be loaded the service should be crash or not. Note: if the agent is not configured to crash, it will not crash regardless of this setting

persistent.description: Indicates if the request should be stored persistently

agentID.description: Indicates the agent ID where this Statement was created

cehandler.description: The handler that manage the streams. Don't overwrite the value if is not understand fully what its mean

discardDataOnFailPolicyOn.description: Sets if the handler should discard the data if the validation fails

essential.description: Indicates if the request fails to be loaded the service should be crash or not. Note: if the agent is not configured to crash, it will not crash regardless of this setting

id.description: Unique identifier of the statement in the agent

name.description: Name of the statement. For add a statement (POST) is mandatory

output.description: The output URIs of the events

persistent.description: Indicates if the request should be stored persistently

publisher.description: Indicates which publisher will be used (MQTT_PUB default)

registrable.description: if the statement should or should not be register outside agent (some catalog)

resultType.description: Indicates that the pushed events should be sent as REST POST and not as MQTT PUB

schema.description: Sets the expected result of this statement

scope.description: Server where the events will be pushed

statement.description: Statement or Query in the underlying implementation of the CEP engine. For most of the cases is mandatory

synchronousResponse.description: In case of a synchronous request, the response will be sent here.
